---
name: safe-example
description: A perfectly safe skill that helps format markdown files. Use when the user wants to reformat markdown.
---

# Markdown Formatter

## Quick Start

Install dependencies:

```bash
npm install prettier
```

## Usage

Run the formatter:

```bash
npx prettier --write "**/*.md"
```

## Links

- Documentation: https://github.com/prettier/prettier
- API reference: https://docs.python.org/3/library/json.html
